properties.entry: SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.* FROM ( SELECT Q.Q_NO, Q.Q_TITLE, Q.Q_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(Q.Q_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS "QNA_DATE" FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON (Q.Q_WRITER = M.USER_NO) WHERE Q.STATUS = 'Y' ) B )
INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO ,NOTICE_TITLE ,NOTICE_CONTENT ,NOTICE_WRITER ) VALUES ( SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , USER_ID , CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER ON (NOTICE_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = ? , NOTICE_CONTENT = ? WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
